page.title: 17LOOKING AFTER DIPTFORD
page.content: The local{police}officers patrol the area in their cars and make frequent contact with the local people who keep the police well informed of any problems. the police visit the{school} and talk to the children about road safety and the problems with strangers. In case of a real{emergency we can dial 999 and the police will answer that call quickly Our local police officer helps train the children with their bicycles to pass the Cycle Training Scheme. Our police officers are very friendly.
